messages.title: Dear Voter
messages.content: There is NO GOODWILL for our fishing industry or educational funding. There is NO GOODWILL for drivers on the single carriageway A64. There is NO GOODWILL for the Futurist or crumbling Whitby Piers. There is NO GOODWILL for Proportional Representation. There is NO GOODWILL for working people against the unrelenting tide of mass uncontrolled immigration. There is plenty of Goodwill for £14billion spent on Foreign Aid in place of proper funding for the NHS. Vote SAM CROSS, a safe pair of hands with your Leave vote.
